```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
classed_verb_stems <- read_tsv("./classed_verb_list.tsv")
verb_counts<- read_tsv("./tagged_word_list_clean.tsv") |> select(word, stem, frequency) |> unique()

joined <- classed_verb_stems |> left_join(verb_counts) |> group_by(stem) |> mutate(sum_count = sum(frequency))
classed_verb_stems_counts <- joined |> select(-c(word, frequency)) |> unique()

write_tsv(joined, "./clean_verb_list.tsv")
write_tsv(classed_verb_stems_counts, "./clean_stemmed_list.tsv")


```
